plugins.name: My Color Palette
plugins.description:
My Color Palette 🌈

Unleash your creativity with precision color selection and easily navigate the world of colors.


No more guesswork, get the perfect color every time

Say goodbye to relying on intuition to pick colors—My Color Palette gives you control over your palette and opens up new creative possibilities. Here’s how it works:


  1. Extract colors directly from any Figma element with a simple click, ensuring perfect consistency in your designs.
  2. Use the brand-new color picker to fine-tune your selection and quickly make adjustments to your design.
  3. Generate various shades, tints, gradients, and complementary colors, adding depth and dimension to your projects.


Save once, use anytime

  1. Save your favorite colors and easily access them next time without hassle.
  2. Your saved palettes can be used across all your Figma and FigJam files. Simply drag and drop them into your projects for seamless design workflows.


Unlock unlimited features with a one-time upgrade

For a one-time payment of $9.9, enjoy unlimited usage and unlock future updates. Plus, you can store your color palettes in the cloud and access them from anywhere.


✨ Not satisfied with your purchase? You can always contact the Figma team for a refund.


Three easy steps to get started

  1. Open the plugin and select an element with a fill or stroke.
  2. Click “Active” to extract the element's color.
  3. Use the color picker or palette generated by the plugin to modify the element’s color.


Pro tips to enhance your workflow

  1. Need the color code? Just click the clipboard icon to copy the hex value instantly.
  2. Found a color you love? Save it by clicking the star icon and access it later.
  3. Keep clicking “Update” to generate fresh color palettes based on your current selection, ensuring your creativity flows uninterrupted.
  4. Drag and rearrange your saved swatches for better organization.
plugins.tagline: Unleash Your Creativity with Effortless Color Harmony!

plugins.name: getVector - Import SVGs from any URL
plugins.description:
Zendeeps | getVector


This plugin lets you import all SVGs from any URL directly into Figma.


  1. Just paste the URL into the plugin
  2. It automatically extracts all SVG files from the page
  3. Instantly adds them to your Figma file


No need to download assets one by one or copy-paste code. It saves time and keeps your workflow inside Figma.

accepted.name: Ruhul
accepted.description: Senior UX/UI Designer and Webflow Developer

plugins.tagline: Import SVGs into Figma from any website

plugins.name: Figmentor – Export Figma to Elementor Instantly
plugins.description:
Figmentor is the ultimate plugin to export your Figma designs directly into Elementor (WordPress) in seconds.


Whether you're a designer, developer, freelancer, or agency, Figmentor saves hours of manual work by turning any Figma frame into a ready-to-use Elementor JSON file pixel-perfect, responsive, and style-preserved.


🎯 Key Features


🔁 One-click Figma to Elementor export


🖼️ Pixel-perfect layout preservation


🎨 Exports text, shapes, images, colors & styles


🤖 AI enhancements (soon) for smarter design output


💼 Built for freelancers, studios & WordPress pros


🔒 Safe, secure access with your personal token


🛠️ Perfect for:

Web designers, WordPress developers, design studios, marketers, no-code builders, and product teams using Figma + Elementor.


🚀 Say goodbye to rebuilding designs from scratch. With Figmentor, what you design is what you ship.
plugins.tagline: Convert Figma designs to Elementor templates with 1 click. Pixel-perfect export, no coding needed.

🎯 Key Features

🖼️ Pixel-perfect layout preservation


🎨 Exports text, shapes, images, colors & styles

plugins.name: Cham Multi-language Translator
plugins.description:
🌟 Introducing the Ultimate Figma Translation Plugin! 🌟


Say goodbye to language barriers and hello to seamless, multilingual designs! Our Figma Translation Plugin is here to revolutionize your workflow, making it easier than ever to create global-ready designs.


✨ Key Features:

🎯 Flexible Selection: Translate selected text, groups, frames, pages, or even your entire design.

✨ Quick Actions: Translate text in a snap—all with just one click!

🌍 Multilingual Output: Supports a wide range of languages to cater to global audiences.

⏱️ Bulk Edit: Save time by editing multiple text layers simultaneously.

🚀 Instant Translation: Translate text layers or entire pages in a single click—no hassle, no delays.


Whether you're working with global teams, freelancing for international clients, or designing for a multilingual audience, this plugin is your go-to solution for efficient and professional translations.


👉 Try it now and experience the difference!


Got feedback or questions? We’d love to hear from you! Reach out to us at cham@idgpt.my.id


#Figma #DesignTools #TranslationPlugin #UXDesign #DesignCommunity


Let’s make your designs speak every language! 🌍✨
plugins.tagline: Speak every language in your designs. Translate in Figma.

plugins.name: Moonshot AI Designer
plugins.description:
Design and test custom AI experiences in Figma.


You’ve validated your approach by building AI prototypes with other tools. Now it’s time to create, iterate, and refine the experience your users need by combining real AI responses with the unique visual style that makes your product stand out.


Moonshot AI Designer helps you optimize AI experiences like:

  1. AI chatbot responses
  2. Streaming and speech
  3. Dynamic prompt-driven content
  4. And more


See your design respond to AI and test it with real user prompts before you build it. Give your moonshot the best possible chance before launch.


Learn the basics of designing custom AI experiences with Moonshot AI Designer at moonshot.app.
plugins.tagline: Design AI experiences

plugins.name: Font Replacer - Compact
plugins.description:
📝 Description

Transform your text styles in seconds! The fastest way to batch update font styles in Figma with minimal effort.


✨ Key Features

- One-click batch replacement for multiple text layers

- Lightning-fast font style updates

- Real-time font preview with instant search

- Auto-detect and display mixed text styles

- Seamless dark mode support

- Clean, minimal interface for maximum efficiency


🚀 Quick Start

1. Select text layers or frames

2. Pick your font settings

3. Click update - Done!


⚠️ Notes

- Ensure target fonts are installed in Figma

- Font names are case-sensitive

- Plugin automatically adapts to Figma's theme


🔧 Troubleshooting

Common issues and quick fixes:

- Font not updating? → Check if font is installed

- Text not changing? → Ensure layers are unlocked

- Nothing selected? → Select text layers first


If you have any suggestions, please feel free to let me know, thanks ❤

Contact: kingyo@live.com
plugins.tagline: A super efficient Figma plugin for replacing text styles with minimal clicks.

plugins.name: JSON Data Auto-Filler
plugins.description:
Figma Json Data Auto-Filler is a versatile plugin that simplifies the process of filling Figma components with JSON data. Designed to support dynamic and data-driven design workflows, this plugin enables designers and developers to quickly batch fill components with data, saving time and enhancing productivity.


💡 Features:

Load Local Files & Fetch Copied Data: Easily import JSON data from local files or clipboard.

Image Data Support: Seamlessly fill components with image data for richer designs.

Nested JSON Parsing: Handles JSON files with any level of nested data.

Flexible Key Selection: Choose specific keys to map JSON data to Figma components.

🎥 Watch the Demo Video:

See the plugin in action here: YouTube Demo


📚 Documentation:

For setup instructions, detailed usage, and tips, visit our documentation:

JSON Data Auto-Filler Documentation


🤙 Feedback:

If you encounter issues or have ideas for improving the plugin, we’d love to hear from you:

Submit Feedback


Elevate your design workflow by automating data entry with Figma Json Data Auto-Filler—ideal for anyone looking to streamline and supercharge their Figma experience!
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly Batch Fill JSON Data into Your Figma Designs

plugins.name: Gradient Generator
plugins.description:
Gradient Generator

This Figma plugin enables designers to effortlessly create gradient-based square patterns. Select two squares with different colors, input the number of squares you'd like generated, and the plugin will automatically produce an array of squares, each shaded with an interpolated color between the two selected hues. This tool is ideal for designing color palettes, gradient backgrounds, or visualizing color transitions in your projects.


Features:

- Color Selection: Pick two squares to use as color anchors.

- Customizable Quantity: Enter the number of gradient squares you'd like to generate.

- Automatic Placement: Squares are aligned in a row for easy visual comparison.

- Smooth Color Interpolation: Each generated square shows a seamless color transition.


Simplify your color design workflow and add gradient-based color arrays with just a few clicks!
plugins.tagline: A Figma plugin to generate gradient squares by selecting two colors and setting the quantity.

107039.name: Gradient Generator
107039.description:

Select two squares with different colors, input the number of squares you'd like generated, and the plugin will automatically produce an array of squares, each shaded with an interpolated color between the two selected hues. This tool is ideal for designing color palettes, gradient backgrounds, or visualizing color transitions in your projects.


Features:

- Color Selection: Pick two squares to use as color anchors.

- Customizable Quantity: Enter the number of gradient squares you'd like to generate.

- Automatic Placement: Squares are aligned in a row for easy visual comparison.

- Smooth Color Interpolation: Each generated square shows a seamless color transition.


Simplify your color design workflow and add gradient-based color arrays with just a few clicks!
107039.tagline: A Figma plugin to generate gradient squares by selecting two colors and setting the quantity.

plugins.name: QuickFrame
plugins.description:
QuickFrame is your new best friend in Figma, helping you skip the fuss and get straight to designing. Need the perfect size for a Facebook post, YouTube thumbnail, or anything in between? QuickFrame has you covered with ready-made frames that match all the popular dimensions. No more guessing or manually resizing—just pick a frame and start creating!


Why You’ll Love QuickFrame:


Ready-Made Frames: We’ve done the hard work for you with preset sizes for social media, print, mobile, and more.

Easy Tweaks: Customize dimensions, resolution, and background colors with just a few clicks—because your design should be exactly how you want it.

Super Simple: It’s quick, it’s easy, and it fits right into your Figma workflow, so you can focus on what you do best.

Saves You Time: Get your designs sized and ready in no time, so you can focus on your creativity.

QuickFrame is here to make your design process smoother and faster—so you can spend more time creating and less time fiddling with dimensions. Give it a try and see how much easier your projects can be!
plugins.tagline: QuickFrame: Your Go-To Tool for Perfectly Sized Designs

plugins.name: Image to Gradient library
plugins.description:
🎨 About

Image to Gradient Library lets you instantly convert any image into a reusable gradient preset in Figma with a single click. Extract key colors, fine-tune palettes, and save your custom gradients directly to your styles library—all within seconds.


🚀 Why Use It?

-Convert images into all types of gradients (linear, radial etc.) with a single click

-Shuffle, ignore, or select specific colors for precise control

-Instantly apply gradients to any layer

-Save as reusable styles for consistency across projects


🧠 Who Is It For?

Perfect for designers working with visual storytelling, brand development, or moodboards. Whether you're building a product UI or a campaign visual, turn inspiration into usable assets instantly.


⚡ What Makes It Different

-Intelligent color extraction from any image

-One-click gradient generation

-Customizable gradient types and color filtering

-Native style saving—no copy/paste needed

-Ultra-fast performance with an intuitive UI


🔐 Licensing

Free to use for personal and commercial projects.
plugins.tagline: Turn images in to gradient presets for you library you can reuse and apply to any layer

plugins.name: Line Height Fixer
plugins.description:
Line Height Fixer 是一款 自动调节行高 的插件，它能让不同字号的行高与字体本身高度相匹配，解决设计图与开发环境下的文本高度不一致的情况，帮助开发同学精准还原设计稿，简化验收流程。


✨插件特性：


  1. 选中文本图层，点击“一键修复”，即可完成行高的修复。
  2. 选中包含文本的图层，点击“一键修复”，即可完成选中图层里面所有的文本元素的行高修复。
  3. 免费！免费！


🎨即将推出的功能：


  1. 当前插件仅支持当行文本的行高自动修复，多行文本暂时不做特殊处理。
  2. （我还没想好，如果你有更好的想法欢迎随时邮件沟通


太好了！是2025！我们有救了！

新年快乐 🎄 （设计师放假去了——



Line Height Fixer is an automatic line-height adjustment plugin. It aligns the line height of text layers with the actual height of the font, solving inconsistencies between design drafts and the text heights in development environments. This helps developers accurately restore design drafts and simplifies the review process.


✨ Plugin Features:


  1. Select a text layer and click "Fix in One Click" to automatically adjust the line height.
  2. Select a layer containing text, and with just one click, all text elements within the layer will have their line heights adjusted.
  3. Free! Yes, it's completely free!


🎨 Upcoming Features:


  1. Currently, the plugin only supports automatic line-height adjustments for single-line text. Multi-line text handling is not yet implemented.
  2. (I haven’t decided what’s next—if you have better ideas, feel free to email me!)


🎉 Great news—it's 2025! We’re saved!

Happy New Year 🎄 The designer’s on holiday now—enjoy! 😄

accepted.name: 拉面
accepted.description:
Unfreelance Designer :)
I love people, products, and words.

plugins.tagline: A simple tool for precisely restoring design drafts.

  3. 免费！免费！


🎨即将推出的功能：


  1. 当前插件仅支持当行文本的行高自动修复，多行文本暂时不做特殊处理。
  2. （我还没想好，如果你有更好的想法欢迎随时邮件沟通


太好了！是2025！我们有救了！

新年快乐 🎄 （设计师放假去了——



Line Height Fixer is an automatic line-height adjustment plugin. It aligns the line height of text layers with the actual height of the font, solving inconsistencies between design drafts and the text heights in development environments. This helps developers accurately restore design drafts and simplifies the review process.


✨ Plugin Features:


  1. Select a text layer and click "Fix in One Click" to automatically adjust the line height.
  2. Select a layer containing text, and with just one click, all text elements within the layer will have their line heights adjusted.
  3. Free! Yes, it's completely free!


🎨 Upcoming Features:


  1. Currently, the plugin only supports automatic line-height adjustments for single-line text. Multi-line text handling is not yet implemented.
  2. (I haven’t decided what’s next—if you have better ideas, feel free to email me!)


🎉 Great news—it's 2025! We’re saved!

Happy New Year 🎄 The designer’s on holiday now—enjoy! 😄
116276.tagline: A simple tool for precisely restoring design drafts.

plugins.name: Sections
plugins.description:
Organize the sections in your file in a few clicks.


How it works:


  1. Launch: CMD+K and type "Sections".
  2. Choose direction: vertical or horizontal.
  3. Set spacing: 100, 250, or 500px presets. (Custom coming soon!)
  4. Apply: Watch Sections organize the sections in your file.


Be default Sections will apply changes to all the sections on the page. If 2 or more sections are selected, then changes will only apply to those.


🍻Cheers to cleaner Figma files.

plugins.name: Framenizer - Organize frames with ease
plugins.description:
Framenizer is a Figma plugin designed to help you organize and manage your frames with ease. Whether you are working on a design system or a simple prototype, it streamlines your workflow by automatically organizing your frames.


Key features

  1. Automatic frame arrangement: Quickly organize your frames in either horizontal or vertical layouts with just a few clicks.
  2. Consistent spacing: Maintain a clean and professional look with consistent spacing between all your frames.
  3. Section titles: Add descriptive titles to your frame groups for better organization and documentation.
  4. Section wrapping: Group related frames together by wrapping them in dedicated sections.
  5. Naming options: Choose between preserving your original frame names or using automatic naming conventions.
  6. Support and feedback: Constantly improving the plugin based on your input.


Need help or have suggestions?

I am always looking to improve the plugin. If you have any questions, encounter issues, or have ideas for new features, please don't hesitate to reach out to me at achmadalimin.com or Linkedin.
plugins.tagline: Help you organize and manage your frames with ease.

plugins.name: Consistent contacts
plugins.description:
This plugin allows you to create your own data structure (text or image) and than fill the data into your frames based on matching layer and key name. You have to have the data structure in a predefined JSON format. Example:

{

"records": [

{

"photo": { "image": "avatar-01.jpg" },

"name": "John Doe",

"id": "1234",

"phone": "+1 110-1234",

"company": "TechNova Inc.",

"position": "Software Engineer",

"email": "john.doe@technova.com"

}

]

}

The JSON can be ZIPped with images to a single file, which you can drop to the plugin and populate the frames. The populated frames have to be wrapped together in a parent frame or a component instance works as well. All the frames or instances have to be selected directly to be populated correctly.


WEBP image format is not supported by Figma. JPG and PNG formats works. The whole ZIP file has to be smaller than 1MB, which is a memory limit for any plugin. The ZIP file is remembered, even if you close the plugin, but it is removed from memory and replaced by a new one, if you select a new file.


Not being a developer myself, this is my very first attempt to create a Figma plugin with a huge help from AI. I was able to make it into a working prototype, but there might still be some glitches. If the plugin does not work correctly, check the ZIP content, JSON structure and correct naming of the images. If the plugin stops to work, try to "Clear memory" via a dedicated button. It should reset everything and clean the memory of the plugin.
plugins.tagline: Fill in consistent connected data to your frames

122889.description:

plugins.name: SelectLock
plugins.description:
💪🏽 Take control of your Figma layers with SelectLock!


SelectLock is your secret weapon for maintaining design integrity in Figma. This powerful plugin lets you lock multiple layers in one go while keeping specific layer types editable.


Here's what you can do:


  1. Bulk lock layers across your entire Figma file
  2. Cherry-pick which layer types stay unlocked
  3. Use a simple checkbox interface for layer selection
  4. Lock your design with just one click
  5. Keep your layer structure intact


Perfect for designers who want to secure their work without sacrificing flexibility. Whether you're polishing a final design or collaborating with a team, SelectLock helps you stay in control. Say goodbye to the tedious task of locking layers one by one. With SelectLock, you're the boss of your design file!


👉🏼 Click here to drop a feedback

👉🏼 Send me a mail


Thank you for using SelectLock.


👉🏼 How to Use


  1. Select the frame or group containing the layers you want to lock
  2. Run the Selectlock plugin from the Plugins menu
  3. In the plugin interface, check the boxes next to any layer types you want to lock/unlock
  4. Click the "Lock/Unlock" button
  5. All checked layer types will be locked/unlocked, while unchecked layer types remain editable/uneditable.
plugins.tagline: Lock specific layer types in bulk. Keep designing freely.

101045.description:

plugins.name: Stroke Manager
plugins.description:
Stroke Manager is a powerful Figma plugin that lets you efficiently manage stroke properties across multiple elements simultaneously. Perfect for designers who work with illustrations, icons, wireframes, or any vector content.


Key Features


  1. Batch Update Strokes: Modify stroke width, alignment, and end caps across multiple elements at once
  2. Smart Color Management: Map colors individually or override all strokes with a single color
  3. End Point Styling: Quickly apply different cap styles (round, square, arrow)
  4. Nested Elements: Apply changes to parent elements and all their children with a single click
  5. Color Detection: Intelligently groups similar colors to simplify your workflow


Why You'll Love It

Save valuable time by updating dozens or hundreds of stroke properties in seconds instead of tediously modifying each element individually. Stroke Manager is particularly useful when adapting illustrations for different sizes or contexts, ensuring consistent stroke weights and styles throughout your design.

Perfect for design system maintenance, icon libraries, and illustration collections, Stroke Manager helps you maintain visual consistency while dramatically speeding up your workflow.
plugins.tagline: Batch Update Strokes

  4. Nested Elements: Apply changes to parent elements and all their children with a single click

plugins.name: Fill Up
plugins.description:
Fill Up 플러그인이 드디어 오픈했습니다!


이제 리스트, 카드 UI, 데이터 그리드 등 다양한 디자인에 가상 데이터를 채우는 일을 더 이상 고민하지 마세요. Fill Up은 클릭 한 번으로 데이터를 랜덤하게 채워주어, 디자인 작업을 더욱 스마트하게 만들어 줍니다. 복잡한 데이터 입력은 저희에게 맡기고, 당신은 디자인에만 집중하세요!


현재는 한국어 텍스트 변환 기능에 우선 집중하고 있지만, 곧 영어 및 다른 언어까지 확장할 예정입니다. 지금은 영어로 Content, Company, Email, Country, Product, Expense, Income, Amount 항목을 지원하고 있으니, 곧 더 많은 언어와 데이터 지원을 기대해 주세요!


Fill Up과 함께 데이터 채우기는 이제 더 이상 귀찮은 일이 아닙니다.



The Fill Up plugin has officially launched!


Now, you don’t need to worry about filling virtual data in lists, card UIs, data grids, and more. With just one click, Fill Up randomly populates your designs with data, making your workflow smarter and more efficient. Leave the complicated data entry to us, so you can focus on what you do best: design!


We’re currently prioritizing Korean text conversion, but we’re working hard to expand support to English and other languages soon. For now, Fill Up supports the following English fields: Content, Company, Email, Country, Product, Expense, Income, and Amount. Stay tuned for more languages and data support!


With Fill Up, data filling is no longer a hassle—it’s a breeze!
plugins.tagline: A plugin that automatically fills in content.

plugins.name: 竹记 - 创意过程记录&实时预览
plugins.description:
1. To use Bamboo Record, you need to install both plug-ins and desktop software. The software can be installed through the official website https://zj.freshart.top/
  2. Please make sure that the plug-ins and software are always on during use;
  3. If you need to use other plug-ins, it is recommended to turn on the Bamboo Record plug-in again as soon as possible after use, otherwise it cannot be recorded;
  4. Bamboo Record will record each design change when running, which can be viewed randomly, and supports exporting the design process to video;
  5. It is better to determine the width and height of the drawing board before running the plug-in. It is not recommended to modify the width and height of the drawing board during the recording process;
  6. In addition, Bamboo Record provides a free real-time preview function that supports multi-device code scanning preview (to ensure that the computer and mobile terminals are on the same local area network and are allowed to pass through the firewall).


--------------


  1. 使用竹记需同时安装插件和桌面端软件，软件可通过官网安装（中文版） https://zj.94xy.com/
  2. 使用过程中请确保插件和软件一直处于开启状态；
  3. 如需使用其它插件，建议在使用之后，尽快再次开启竹记插件，否则无法记录；
  4. 竹记运行时会记录每一次设计变更，随机可以查看，支持将设计过程导出为视频：
  5. 在运行插件前就确定好画板宽高效果更佳，不建议在记录过程中修改画板宽高；
  6. 另外竹记提供了免费的实时预览功能，支持多设备扫码预览（使用需确保电脑端和移动端处于同一局域网，并允许通过防火墙）。
plugins.tagline: Record creative footprints and capture design moments

  6. In addition, Bamboo Record provides a free real-time preview function that supports multi-device code scanning preview (to ensure that the computer and mobile terminals are on the same local area network and are allowed to pass through the firewall).


--------------


  1. 使用竹记需同时安装插件和桌面端软件，软件可通过官网安装（中文版） https://zj.94xy.com/
  2. 使用过程中请确保插件和软件一直处于开启状态；
  3. 如需使用其它插件，建议在使用之后，尽快再次开启竹记插件，否则无法记录；
  4. 竹记运行时会记录每一次设计变更，随机可以查看，支持将设计过程导出为视频：
  5. 在运行插件前就确定好画板宽高效果更佳，不建议在记录过程中修改画板宽高；
  6. 另外竹记提供了免费的实时预览功能，支持多设备扫码预览（使用需确保电脑端和移动端处于同一局域网，并允许通过防火墙）。

manifest.name: 竹记 - 创意过程记录&实时预览

plugins.name: Glyph Viewer
plugins.description: This plugin extracts and previews a curated set of useful Unicode characters from the currently selected font in a text node — including Latin, Cyrillic, arrows, currency, digits, dashes, and more. Click any glyph to insert it. Recent picks are saved. Works offline, respects dark mode, and skips unsupported characters automatically.
plugins.tagline: One plugin to glyph them all. Click, insert, done.

plugins.name: X8 Content Machine
plugins.description:
Transforme seus carrosséis no Figma com inteligência, agilidade e personalização.


X8 Content Machine é um plugin inteligente que automatiza a inserção de textos, imagens e paletas de cores diretamente nos seus templates do Figma. Ideal para designers, social medias e equipes de marketing, ele permite montar carrosséis visualmente incríveis em poucos cliques.


⚙️ Funcionalidades principais:

  1. Aplicação automática de textos em múltiplos frames com organização por tópicos.
  2. Upload e ordenação de imagens com visualização numerada e arraste para reordenar.
  3. Paletas de cores personalizadas e pré-definidas, com suporte a edição e preview em tempo real.l.


🚀 Interface intuitiva com abas separadas para textos, imagens e cores.


🔁 Integração perfeita com o Figma, mantendo o fluxo de criação rápido e fluido.


💡 Perfeito para quem quer:

Ganhar tempo na criação de conteúdo visual.

Padronizar projetos com rapidez.

Automatizar a produção de artes para redes sociais.
plugins.tagline: Altere textos, imagens e cores de templates figma em alguns cliques

plugins.name: UILENS™ - UI Components
plugins.description:
UILENS™ - UI Design Components

Helps creators and teams design user interfaces faster. It offers a collection of high-detail, professional UI components that you can easily import into Figma, keeping your designs consistent and efficient.


HOW IT WORKS

1. Browse

Discover the perfect components that suit your project's requirements and spark your creativity.


2. Copy to clipboard

Simply click over any component to copy to clipboard, enabling you to easily paste-import it into your Figma project.


3. Paste into Figma

Paste directly (Cmd+V for Mac or Ctrl+V for Windows) into Figma and watch as the component becomes a part of your project.


Learn more - uilens.com


Made with ♥️

by Voicu Apostol

cerpow.com
plugins.tagline: Create beautiful designs with our professional UI components.

plugins.name: wip!
plugins.description:
This plugin allows you to add or remove a red semi-transparent overlay to selected frames in Figma. It is designed to visually mark work-in-progress (WIP) elements directly within the design interface.


How to use

  1. Select one or multiple elements. Currently supporting: Frames, Auto-Layout Frames and Text.
  2. Run the plugin.
  3. When a frame is selected, the plugin checks for an existing overlay named 'wip'. If found, it removes the overlay; if not, it creates a new rectangle with a red semi-transparent fill and positions it to cover the entire frame. When a text is selected plugin adds a red semi-transparent fill with the same logic.
  4. To delete the overlay or fill run the plugin again.


This plugin supports frames with Auto Layout, adjusting the overlay accordingly.


You can expect a straightforward way to highlight and manage WIP items in their Figma designs, with limitations around specific node type support.


Add the plugin to Keyboard Shortcuts:

  1. Settings -> Keyboard -> Keyboard Shortcuts... -> App Shortcuts
  2. Press [+] button and choose "Figma".
  3. Write the plugin name "wip!" in menu title. Add shortcut combination. I personally use control + option + w.
plugins.tagline: Show that the selected frames or copy are not yet ready and you're still working on them

93387.name: wip!
93387.description:
This plugin allows you to add or remove a red semi-transparent overlay to selected frames in Figma. It is designed to visually mark work-in-progress (WIP) elements directly within the design interface.


How to use

  1. Select one or multiple elements. Currently supporting: Frames, Auto-Layout Frames and Text.
  2. Run the plugin.
  3. When a frame is selected, the plugin checks for an existing overlay named 'wip'. If found, it removes the overlay; if not, it creates a new rectangle with a red semi-transparent fill and positions it to cover the entire frame. When a text is selected plugin adds a red semi-transparent fill with the same logic.
  4. To delete the overlay or fill run the plugin again.


This plugin supports frames with Auto Layout, adjusting the overlay accordingly.


You can expect a straightforward way to highlight and manage WIP items in their Figma designs, with limitations around specific node type support.


Add the plugin to Keyboard Shortcuts:

  1. Settings -> Keyboard -> Keyboard Shortcuts... -> App Shortcuts
  2. Press [+] button and choose "Figma".
  3. Write the plugin name "wip!" in menu title. Add shortcut combination. I personally use control + option + w.
93387.release_notes: The latest update adds automatic constraints to the "Work in Progress" overlay, ensuring it remains perfectly aligned to all sides of the parent frame even when resized.
93387.tagline: Show that the selected frames or copy are not yet ready and you're still working on them

plugins.name: Text Style Capture - FREE Copy and Paste
plugins.description:
Beta 0.1

Hi there! I built this plugin to solve a problem I face every day: transferring text styles between Figma files.

This simple solution helps you quickly capture text styles from one file and paste them into another, maintaining all the original properties. No more recreating styles from scratch or dealing with inconsistencies!

It's still in early beta (version 0.1), but it already saves me tons of time, and I hope it helps you too.

Key features:


One-click text style capture

Select which styles to transfer

Persistent storage between sessions

Clean, modern interface


I'd love to hear your feedback! If you encounter any bugs or have suggestions for improvements, please let me know. I'm actively working on making this plugin better.

If you find this helpful and want to support further development, you can buy me a coffee.

Thanks for trying it out!
plugins.tagline: Copy and paste Text Styles

plugins.name: FrameSwapper | Frame to Component
plugins.description:
✨Overview

FrameSwapper is a powerful Figma plugin that helps you replace multiple frames with the same name with a selected component. Perfect for design system implementation and large-scale design updates.


✨ Key Features

  1. 🔍 Smart frame detection: Automatically finds all frames with the same name
  2. 🖼️ Visual preview: Shows thumbnails of both frames and components
  3. ⚡ Batch replacement: Replace multiple frames at once
  4. 🎨 Component integrity: Maintains original component dimensions and properties
  5. 🔎 Search functionality: Quickly find components by name
  6. 📱 Clean UI: Modern, intuitive interface


🛠️ How It Works

  1. Select any frame in your design
  2. Click "Find Matching Frames" to detect similar frames
  3. Choose which frames to replace (or use "Select All")
  4. Pick a component from the available list
  5. Click "Replace" to transform your frames


💡 Use Cases

  1. Implementing design system components across multiple frames
  2. Updating old designs with new component versions
  3. Standardizing repeated elements across your design
  4. Converting prototype frames into component instances


🆕 Version 1.0.0 Updates

  1. Initial release with core functionality
  2. Smart component replacement system
  3. Visual preview system
  4. Search and filter capabilities
  5. Batch selection and replacement
  6. Modern, user-friendly interface


💡Resources & Links

📝 [Feedback Form](https://forms.gle/goMQSobvFav6Unjy9)


❤️Plugin & UXUI Designer

Cupi Ng

accepted.name: Cupi
accepted.description:
UXUI Designer, Etsy Seller, INTP
🌎 Life = Design + Tech + AI + Game
✨ Share what I know as a designer

plugins.tagline: Batch replace frames with components - Perfect for design system updates and UI handoff⚡

plugins.name: Tiiny Color Palette Generator
plugins.description:
Tiiny empowers you to generate natural color palettes with tints and shades in 12 stops, based on your chosen base color.


Key Features:

  1. Dynamic Palette Generation: Automatically generate a cohesive color palette with multiple shades and tints tailored to your base color, ensuring visual consistency across your project.
  2. Customizable Formats: Choose between RGB, HSL, and HSB color formats to suit your specific design needs and preferences.
  3. Accessibility Focused: Designed with accessibility in mind, ensuring that your color choices are both visually appealing and inclusive.


Transform your design process with the Tiiny Color Palette Generator and bring vibrant, cohesive colors to your projects with just a few clicks. Elevate your creativity and ensure consistency across all your design endeavors!
plugins.tagline: Create natural looking color palettes with 12 stops, for your designs.
